title: Brilliant!
comment: This app saved me from sending in my Crafty to Storz and Bickel for a firmware upgrade, nice one dev,  made my day:)

title: Fixed my crafty lollipop issue
comment: I couldn't connect to my old firmware crafty, but with this app (polling enabled for old crafty firmware) I can now use crafty again without having to send it in for firmware upgrade. You are an amazing developer... Too bad storz and bickel app developers aren't as ingenious as you.

title: Pretty nice and simple
comment: Edit: the app is now 5 starts since the Fahrenheit was fixed! Awesome job
Fahrenheit support now in 1.4 release  - thanks for the feedback!

title: crafty
comment: Awesome app. Better than the original. Thanks dev!

title: Was working fine
comment: Now after the update it closes immediately on start up.
Sorry for this - fixed in 1.5 which I just rolled out - there was a problem with the export in 1.4
